trans-unit.source: Provides the <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class for a collection of associated <xref:System.String> keys and <xref:System.Object> values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref>基类的集合关联<xref:System.String>密钥和<xref:System.Object>可通过键或索引访问的值。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The underlying structure for this class is a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 此类的基础结构是一个哈希表。

trans-unit.source: Each element is a key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 每个元素是一个键/值对。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a NameObjectCollectionBase is the number of elements the NameObjectCollectionBase can hold.
trans-unit.target: NameObjectCollectionBase 的容量是 NameObjectCollectionBase 能够容纳的元素数。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a NameObjectCollectionBase, the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation.
trans-unit.target: 当元素添加到 NameObjectCollectionBase 时，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the NameObjectCollectionBase instance.
trans-unit.target: 哈希代码提供程序分配 NameObjectCollectionBase 实例中的键的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The default hash code provider is the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 默认哈希代码提供程序为<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>。</xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: The comparer determines whether two keys are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较器确定两个键是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The default comparer is the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>.
trans-unit.target: 默认比较器是<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>.</xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，此类使用区分区域性的字符串比较。

trans-unit.source: However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> when comparing strings.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在.NET Framework 1.1 和更高版本中，此类使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>比较字符串时。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何区域性影响比较和排序的详细信息，请参阅[执行不区分区域性的字符串操作](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: `null` is allowed as a key or as a value.
trans-unit.target: `null`允许作为键或值。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;><xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>方法之间没有区别`null`返回这是因为找不到指定的键和`null`因为与键关联的值返回这`null`。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref> class that is empty.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>为空的类。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>可以容纳。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>时调整操作

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 在由连续的元素，如列表，集合中移除的元素下面的元素的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶，如哈希表的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the collection contains multiple entries with the specified key, this method sets only the first entry.

trans-unit.target: 获取中包含的键/值对的数目<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The capacity is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> can store.
trans-unit.target: 容量是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>可以存储。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Count is the number of elements that are actually in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 计数是其实是<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>的元素的数目

trans-unit.source: The capacity is always greater than or equal to Count.
trans-unit.target: 容量始终是大于或等于计数。

trans-unit.source: If Count exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果计数超出添加元素时的容量，通过在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组自动增大容量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.target: 中包含的键/值对的数目<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的枚举数循环访问<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This enumerator returns the keys of the collection as strings.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举器返回的字符串形式的集合的键。

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用`foreach`建议，而不是直接操作枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中中的数据，但它们不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中的第一个元素之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>此外会回此位置的枚举数。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置上，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是不确定的。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>的第一个元素的集合，然后再读取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>的值枚举器向前移动</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>返回相同的对象之前<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>称为。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>设置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>到下一个元素。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是不确定的。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>可以再次，集合的第一个元素调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>后, 跟<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改，如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合; 独占访问权因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以锁定在整个枚举期间的集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许访问集合以进行读取和写入的多个线程，则必须实现自己的同步。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref> instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>实例是只读的。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的不允许添加、 移除或修改元素的集合在创建后。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>实例是只读的; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref> object is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否访问<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>对象已同步 （线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object is not synchronized.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>不同步对象。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性在整个枚举期间。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取可以用于对访问进行同步的对象<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> class using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>类使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须在执行操作<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>对象，不是直接对<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>对象。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保正确地执行操作的从其他对象派生的集合。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>对象。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>
